plot: Following an altercation in a witchcraft museum, Gwen acquires a potent charm that grants enough extraordinary good luck for her to proclaim herself a new superhero - Lucky Girl.

A grateful museum gives Ben (as XLR8) some souvenirs after he foils an evil wizard's attempt to steal a recently discovered spell book. When Gwen gets jealous over the lavish public attention Ben receives, he gives her one of his souvenirs. She soon discerns it's a magic charm that makes everything go her way, enough for her to proclaim herself "Lucky Girl". Now the Tennysons have two superheros in the family (and an evil wizard out to thwart them both).—Jesse Sanchez
